text: Steve Di Giorgio (born November 7, 1967) is an American musician. He is known for playing the bass guitar for many heavy metal bands, such as Death, Testament, and Megadeth. He has been on over 50 different albums. He is thought to be one of the first people to play heavy metal music using a bass with no frets. Most of the time he plays using only his fingers, but has used a pick when playing some songs. == References == Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:American guitarists
